Apple___Apple_scab: Apple scab is a disease of apple trees caused by the ascomycete fungus Venturia inaequalis.
Apple___Black_rot: Black rot is a disease of apple trees caused by the fungus Botryosphaeria obtusa.
Apple___Cedar_apple_rust: Cedar apple rust is caused by the fungus Gymnosporangium juniperi-virginianae.
Cherry_(including_sour)___Powdery_mildew: Powdery mildew on cherry is caused by the fungus Podosphaera clandestina.
Corn_(maize)___Cercospora_leaf_spot Gray: Cercospora leaf spot is a fungal disease of maize caused by Cercospora zeae-maydis.
Corn_(maize)___Common_rust_: Common rust of corn is caused by the fungus Puccinia sorghi.
Corn_(maize)___Northern_Leaf_Blight: Northern corn leaf blight is caused by the fungus Exserohilum turcicum.
Grape___Black_rot: Grape black rot is caused by the fungus Guignardia bidwellii.
Grape___Esca_(Black_Measles): Esca, or black measles, is a fungal disease of grapevine caused by a complex of fungi.
Grape___Leaf_blight_(Isariopsis_Leaf_Spo: Isariopsis leaf spot is caused by the fungus Pseudocercospora vitis.
Orange___Haunglongbing_(Citrus_greening): Citrus greening disease is caused by the bacterium Candidatus Liberibacter asiaticus.
Peach___Bacterial_spot: Bacterial spot of peach is caused by the bacterium Xanthomonas campestris pv. pruni.
Pepper,_bell___Bacterial_spot: Bacterial spot of pepper is caused by Xanthomonas campestris pv. vesicatoria.
Pepper,_bell___healthy: The bell pepper plant is healthy.
Potato___Early_blight: Early blight of potato is caused by the fungus Alternaria solani.
Potato___Late_blight: Late blight of potato is caused by the oomycete Phytophthora infestans.
Squash___Powdery_mildew: Powdery mildew on squash is caused by the fungi Podosphaera xanthii or Erysiphe cichoracearum.
Strawberry___Leaf_scorch: Leaf scorch of strawberry is caused by the fungus Diplocarpon earlianum.
Tomato___Bacterial_spot: Bacterial spot of tomato is caused by several species of Xanthomonas.
Tomato___Early_blight: Early blight of tomato is caused by the fungus Alternaria solani.
Tomato___Late_blight: Late blight of tomato is caused by the oomycete Phytophthora infestans.
Tomato___Leaf_Mold: Leaf mold of tomato is caused by the fungus Passalora fulva.
Tomato___Septoria_leaf_spot: Septoria leaf spot of tomato is caused by the fungus Septoria lycopersici.
Tomato___Spider_mites Two-spotted_spider: Two-spotted spider mites on tomato are caused by the mite Tetranychus urticae.
Tomato___Target_Spot: Target spot of tomato is caused by the fungus Corynespora cassiicola.
Tomato___Tomato_Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus: Tomato yellow leaf curl virus (TYLCV) is caused by a virus of the genus Begomovirus.
Tomato___Tomato_mosaic_virus: Tomato mosaic virus (ToMV) is caused by a virus of the genus Tobamovirus.
